name: Labuleta The Love Letter
description:
A long time ago i want to be a superhero, but i also want to be a creator or inventor. lol 

But when i grow-up i addicted to games, until i end up at kind of point that i should be a game developer, and now i am focusing learning game development to be awesome game developer. I interested in 2D, 3D, Augmented Reality (AR), and Virtual Reality (VR).

When i learning game development i learn those style development for 2D to VR, i create my apps for mobile and pc each style of development from 2D to VR.

Labuleta The Love Letter is one of them but i considering this games is not complete yet and still in development. This Labuleta The Love Letter was release early 2019 on playstore but the result is really mess, and i need your help guys what we should improve for Labuleta The Love Letter!

This games plan to only for mobile; for android and iOS.

But here you can download and play this games for free, and please let me know your opinion and your suggest to improve this games! What should to be attached to this game and what should not to attached.

#gamedevelopment #gamedeveloper #gamedev #game #android
